description: Try our easy to follow Ginger & Garlic Prawns With Vegetables recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Ginger & Garlic Prawns With Vegetables Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 625g raw jumbo prawn, peeled with tails left intact
1 large carrot, halved and thinly sliced diagonally
8 scallions, diagonally sliced into 1 1/4 inch lengths
1 inch fresh ginger root, peeled and finely shredded

recipeInstructions.text: Put the prawn into a glass or ceramic bowl and add all the ingredients for the marinade. Toss to coat evenly, cover, and let marinate at room temperature for 10 minutes.

Meanwhile, spray a large, nonstick wok or skillet with cooking spray and heat over high heat. Add the onion and stir-fry for about 3-4 minutes, until softened. Add the broccoli, carrot, scallions, and ginger and stir-fry for about 3-4 minutes, until just tender. Stir in the stock and cook for 2-3 minutes.
Stir the prawn mixture and oyster sauce into the pan and cook, stirring, for 3-4 minutes, until the prawn have turned pink and are firm. Serve with rice or noodles.
